title: The Lady in Black
description: *********** REVISED EDIT VERSION 07/29/2103 *************Explicit Adult material******Intended for mature readers only*****A writer moves back to the City to return to the life he left behind; only to discover a life beyond his imagination.The series follows the non-traditional and explicitly erotic exploits of the Writer and his neighbors; and the people with whom they come in contact.Series subject matter includes (non-extreme) Bondage and Restraint, Seduction of both men and women- by women, Female domination, male and female submission, and” female on male strap-on use”. (I did say it was explicit and non-traditional) Material may vary by installment.
author: Alan Rovel
